alert.note: Alert for Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau; West Central Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 1:46PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTH CENTRAL MCKINLEY COUNTY THROUGH 215 PM MDT... At 145 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Standing Rock, or 11 miles west of Crownpoint, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crownpoint and Mariano Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau; West Central Mountains
